data.title: Efrat Shamban
data.meta_description: Read all of the posts by Efrat Shamban on Comm 663's Blog
data.text:
Last June I visited my family after six months of not seeing them. usually when I’m coming home I don’t have specific plans or things to do. I hang out with my friends, have family dinners, lay on the beach and do some shopping. That visit was planned to be two weeks and I didn’t…

Ever since I moved to this amazing city, I’ve been trying to explore not only NYC but also the surrounding areas. There are a few limitations, because I don’t earn enough money and I travel between three to four times a year to my homeland. Last year I traveled to Jamaica with Nama, my friend…

Today I watched the movie that the prof recommended us called Disconnect. I must say it’s very hard for me to write this post because I’m speechless. The movie combines three stories. the first one is about two children that thought it would be funny to pretend and be a girl online in order to emotionally…

Foodies wanted, new blogpost all about the new vegan cuisine.

Every Sunday my friend and I have scheduled brunch dates. This week we planned on going to Alice’s Tea Cup, but apparently the voucher that I bought wasn’t valid for Sundays. We started googling new places for brunch. I came up with a few coffee shops that I already knew of, but my friend told…

In New York city brunch is the most important meal of the weekends. It’s a social event and everyone enjoys it. That’s the reason i’m writing a second post about it. There are plenty of brunch places to go to in the city, I hope I can help you in choosing the best ones to…

One of the desserts I like the most are cupcakes. A few months ago my friend and I decided to go to a baking class, we wanted to know how to make cupcakes and not just how to eat them. I started searching online for classes and I got to the Groupon website. There was…

Last week my family flew back home after spending 10 days with me in New York. We traveled to CT and stayed there for four days. One of the coolest experiences of being in CT is getting a chance to eat at the famous restaurant called Mystic Pizza. The landscape of CT is very different…

New York city is famous for their weekend brunch. Luckily due to the gorgeous summer weather I was fortunate enough to spend my weekends exploring and scouting the finest dining establishments fit for brunch with friends. Check out my list below and make sure to leave a comment about your favorite place to brunch. Top…

Find out what my top three favorite bakeries in New York City.
